Job Description: A typical SDE1 is expected to take up the following responsibilities:Be a hands-on engineer and build well designed and high-quality productReview design documentation and code written by other engineers.Be part of the lateral hiring processShould strive for following best coding/software practices throughout the process of designing, development, and testing.Skills:Deep understanding of algorithms and data structuresProficiency in one of the languages like NodeJS, Java, Python, Ruby, etcExperience in object-oriented programmingExperience in working with fairly complex database schemas (structured or unstructured databases)Should have worked with MVC frameworks, web/client-server
UG: B.Tech/B.E. in Any Specialization, BCA in Any Specialization
